name: Ultimate Space Shooter (JonesPawa)
description:
Everyone knows these boring space shooter games. Without challenge, without fun...

But not in this game! Here you will experience action at its best. 

Defeat flying meteor rocks with your cool laser shot, collect powerups to upgrade your weapon, fly through space and time and teleport to the other end of the world. And if you haven't had enough of that, a gigantic and almost invincible final boss awaits you. Do you have the power to face this immense challenge?

And to make sure your efforts are not in vain, you can show off your incredible high score to all your friends.

A game by:

Nils Hothum

Jonas Wagner - JonesPawa
